languages.text: "Моя задача — охранять десятину. Даже от Вольного Торговца, если потребуется. Так что объяснитесь, иначе я приму меры".
"My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."
languages.original_text: "Моя задача — охранять десятину. Даже от Вольного Торговца, если потребуется. Так что объяснитесь, иначе я приму меры".

traits.locale_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from the Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."
"My job is to guard the tithe, even from the Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."
"My job is to guard the tithe, even from the Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

"My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."
"My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

languages.text: «Mi trabajo es proteger el diezmo, incluso ante un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, de ser necesario. Explíquese, por favor, o me veré obligada a actuar».
languages.original_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

traits.locale_text: «Mi trabajo es proteger el diezmo, incluso ante un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, de ser necesario. Explíquese, por favor, o me veré obligada a actuar».

languages.text: “我的任务是守护什一税。如果有必要，我甚至有权与行商浪人对质。希望你能给我个解释，否则我恐怕不得不采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

traits.locale_text: “我的任务是守护什一税。如果有必要，我甚至有权与行商浪人对质。希望你能给我个解释，否则我恐怕不得不采取行动。”

languages.text: 「私の仕事は租税を守ることです。必要があれば、たとえそれがローグトレーダーであっても。説明してください。さもなくば措置を取らざるを得ません」
languages.original_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

traits.locale_text: 「私の仕事は租税を守ることです。必要があれば、たとえそれがローグトレーダーであっても。説明してください。さもなくば措置を取らざるを得ません」

languages.text: « Ma mission consiste à défendre la dîme, y compris face à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} si nécessaire. Veuillez avoir l'obligeance de vous expliquer, faute de quoi je me verrai contrainte de sévir. »
languages.original_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

traits.locale_text: « Ma mission consiste à défendre la dîme, y compris face à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} si nécessaire. Veuillez avoir l'obligeance de vous expliquer, faute de quoi je me verrai contrainte de sévir. »

languages.text: "Benim işim aşarı korumak. Gerekirse bizzat Hür Tacir'den. Kendinizi izah etmezseniz eyleme geçmek zorunda kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

traits.locale_text: "Benim işim aşarı korumak. Gerekirse bizzat Hür Tacir'den. Kendinizi izah etmezseniz eyleme geçmek zorunda kalacağım."

languages.text: "Meine Aufgabe ist der Schutz des Zehnts, wenn nötig auch vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Also erklärt Euch, oder ich muss etwas unternehmen."
languages.original_text: "My job is to guard the tithe, even from a Rogue Trader if necessary. Kindly explain yourself, or I will be forced to take action."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Aufgabe ist der Schutz des Zehnts, wenn nötig auch vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Also erklärt Euch, oder ich muss etwas unternehmen."
